data.title: List of Greece international footballers
data.text:
This is a list of Greece international footballers – football players who have played for the Greece national football team. All players with 50 or more official caps are listed here.

This table takes into account all Greece matches played up to and including 11 June 2024. Members of the Euro 2004-winning side are indicated by an asterisk (*). Those currently available for selection are denoted in bold.

# Name Career Caps Goals 1 Giorgos Karagounis* 1999–2014 139 10 2 Theodoros Zagorakis* 1994–2007 120 3 3 Kostas Katsouranis* 2003–2015 116 10 4 Vasilis Torosidis 2007–2019 101 10 5 Angelos Basinas* 1999–2009 100 7 6 Stratos Apostolakis 1986–1998 96 5 7 Sokratis Papastathopoulos 2008–2019 90 3 8 Antonis Nikopolidis* 1999–2008 90 0 9 Angelos Charisteas* 2001–2011 88 25 10 Dimitris Salpingidis 2005–2014 82 13 11 Georgios Samaras 2006–2014 81 9 12 Theofanis Gekas 2005–2014 78 24 13 Dimitris Saravakos 1982–1994 78 22 14 Stelios Giannakopoulos* 1997–2008 77 12 15 Tasos Mitropoulos 1978–1994 77 8 16 Panagiotis Tsalouchidis 1987–1995 76 16 17 Nikos Liberopoulos 1996–2012 76 13 18 Alexandros Tziolis 2006–2018 75 2 19 Nikos Anastopoulos 1977–1988 75 29 20 Giourkas Seitaridis* 2002–2012 72 1 21 Giannis Kalitzakis 1987–1999 71 0 22 Stelios Manolas 1982–1995 71 6 23 Vasilios Tsiartas* 1994–2005 70 12 24 Nikos Dabizas* 1994-2004 70 0 25 Zisis Vryzas* 1994–2005 68 9 26 Anastasios Bakasetas 2016– 67 15 27 Savvas Kofidis 1982–1994 67 1 28 Kostas Mitroglou 2009–2019 65 17 29 Petros Mantalos 2014– 62 6 30 Georgios Georgiadis* 1993–2004 61 11 31 Nikos Machlas 1993–2002 61 18 32 Mimis Papaioannou 1963–1978 61 21 33 Sotiris Kyrgiakos 2002–2010 61 4 34 Takis Fyssas* 1999–2007 60 4 35 Nikos Sarganis 1980–1991 58 0 36 Loukas Vyntra 2005–2015 57 0 37 Kostas Fortounis 2012–2023 56 9 38 Demis Nikolaidis* 1995–2004 54 17 39 Traianos Dellas* 2001–2009 53 1 40 Georgios Foiros 1974–1982 52 0 41 Kostas Iosifidis 1974–1982 51 2 42 Petros Michos 1982–1988 51 0 43 Mimis Domazos 1959–1980 50 4 44 Marinos Ouzounidis 1992–2001 50 4 45 Giannis Maniatis 2010–2017 50 1 46 Georgios Tzavellas 2010–2023 50 3
